name: Chiikawa Perfect One Focus Smooth Cleansing Balm (Deep Black)
description:
Remove the blackheads and dirt you are concerned about, and seriously make up,  "Serious Pore Care" Cleansing Balm
Size (approx.): H61×W73×D73 Weight (approx.): 75g Material: Paper, Plastic Manufactured in: Japan Full Ingredients: Palmitic acid ethylhexyl, triisostearin acid PEG-20 glyceryl, tri (caprylic acid/capric acid) glyceryl, dimethicone linoleic acid water-added himashi oil, isostearin acid PEG-10, synthetic wax, himawari seed oil, water-soluble collagen, hydrolyzed collagen, saksinoyl atelocollagen, isostearoyl hydrolyzed collagen, cocoil hydrolyzed collagen K, miristyl-3 glyceryl ascorbyl acid, cysteine/origomeric proanthocyanidin, inosital, kinua seed extract, salvia hispanica seed oil, baobab seed oil, budou seed oil, makademia seed oil, aristotelia chilensis fruit extract, tulip flower extract, wild thyme extract, artichoke leaf extract, comfrey extract, schizosaccharomyces/ichijiku fruit fermentation liquid, maclopoctrium atropurpureum flower/leaf/stem extract, colloidal gold, glutathione, ascorbyl acid, palmitic acid ascorbyl acid linoleic acid 3Na, clay, charcoal, ceramide NP, ceramide NG, ceramide AP, pulkenetia volubilis seed oil, argan spinosa kernel oil, saponaria holiatus fruit extract, grapefruit fruit extract, sanzashi extract, natsume fruit extract, lingonberry extract, lime fruit juice, orange fruit juice, lemon fruit juice, papain, lipase, protease, hyaluronic acid Na, hydroxypropyltrimonium hyaluronate, mulberry root extract, water, BG, glycerin, kitosan, poly-γ-glutamic acid Na, polyglutamic acid, squalane, isostearin acid, maltodextrin, sorbitol, propanediol, 1,2-hexanediol, caprylyl glycol, acetyl hydroxyproline, microcrystalline wax, citric acid tocopherol, jicama acid polyglyceryl-6, diisopropyl sebacate, water-added lecithin, phytosterols, PVP, tocopherol, hydroxyethylcellulose, behenyl alcohol, algen acid Na, carbomer, kisantangum, linoleic acid 2Na, linoleic acid K, stearoyl glutamic acid, lactic acid, phenoxyethanol, palmarosa oil, neotensique oil, aomojika fruit oil, enpitsubyakushin oil, orange peel oil, onisalvia oil, rosemary flower oil, lemon peel oil, artemisia palens flower/leaf/stem oil, ilangilang flower oil, damask rose flower oil
1. Please use while paying close attention to whether there are any abnormalities on your skin. If cosmetics do not suit your skin, please stop using them immediately in the following cases. Continuing to use cosmetics as is may worsen symptoms, so we recommend consulting with a dermatologist, etc. (1) During use, if abnormalities such as redness, swelling, itching, irritation, depigmentation (white spots, etc.) or darkening appear (2) If the skin used is exposed to direct sunlight and the above abnormalities appear 2. Do not use on areas with wounds, swelling, eczema, etc., or other abnormalities. 3. (1) Be careful not to get it in your eyes. (2) If it gets in, do not rub and wash it off immediately. (3) If a foreign body sensation remains in your eyes, please consult an ophthalmologist. 4. Precautions for storage and handling (1) Use promptly after opening. (2) Keep out of reach of infants. (3) Do not store in extremely high or low temperatures or in direct sunlight. (4) During storage, ensure that no moisture enters the container, and store in a well-ventilated place. (5) There is a risk of moisture entering the product, so use it with dry hands and fingers. (6) Be sure to close the cap tightly after use.

name: Chiikawa Perfect One Focus Smooth Cleansing Balm
description:
Clean the blackheads and dirt in the pores that bother you. A creamy cleansing balm that melts gently.
Size (approx.): H61×W73×D73mmWeight (approx.): 75gMaterial: Paper, PlasticManufactured in: JapanIngredients: Palmitic Acid Ethylhexyl Ester, Trisostearyl Acid PEG-20 Glyceryl, Tri (Caprylic/Capric Acid) Glyceryl, Sodium Polyisobutene, Synthetic Wax, Hexyl (Hydroxy Stearyl Acid/Stearyl Acid/Rosin Acid) Dipentaerythrityl, Trisostearyl Acid PEG-5 Glyceryl, Water-Soluble Collagen, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Saccharinyl Arterocollagen, Isostearyl Oil Hydrolyzed Collagen, Cocoa Oil Hydrolyzed Collagen K, Myristyl 3-Glyceryl Ascorbic Acid, Sistine/Olivemeric Proanthocyanidin, Inositol, Quinoa Seed Extract, Salvia Hispana Seed Oil, Baobab Seed Oil, Bodo Seed Oil, Macadamia Seed Oil, Hamamelis Leaf Extract, Artichoke Leaf Extract, Mandarin Orange Peel Extract, Bergamot Fruit Extract, Sappin Dustoria Fruit Extract, Grapefruit Fruit Extract, Sansashie Extract, Natsume Fruit Extract, Lingo Fruit Extract, Lime Fruit Juice, Orange Fruit Juice, Lemon Fruit Juice, Papain, Hyaluronic Acid Na, Hydroxylproline, Murasaki Root Extract, Water, BG, Kitosan, Poly-γ-Glutamic Acid Na, Polyglutamic Acid, Kaolin, Talc, Tocopherol, Gimechilsilica, Squaran, Isostearyl Acid, Silica, Behenyl Alcohol, PVP, Alginic Acid Na, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Poly-ε-Lysine, Cetearyl Glucoside, Fenoxietanol, Orange Oil, Bergamot Fruit Oil
1. Please use with caution to ensure that there are no abnormalities on your skin. If cosmetics do not suit your skin, please discontinue use immediately in the following cases. Continuing to use cosmetics as is may worsen the symptoms, so it is recommended to consult a dermatologist, etc. (1) If abnormalities such as redness, swelling, itching, irritation, color loss (such as white spots), or darkening appear during use (2) If abnormalities such as those mentioned above appear on the used skin when exposed to direct sunlight 2. Do not use on areas with wounds, swelling, eczema, etc. 3. (1) Be careful not to get it in your eyes. (2) If it gets in, do not rub and immediately rinse thoroughly. (3) If a foreign body sensation remains in your eyes, please consult an ophthalmologist. 4. Notes on storage and handling (1) Please use promptly after opening. (2) Store out of reach of infants. (3) Do not store in places with extremely high or low temperatures or in direct sunlight. (4) When storing, ensure that moisture does not get into the container, and store in a well-ventilated place. (5) There is a risk of moisture getting into the product, so please use it with dry hands and fingers. (6) Be sure to close the cap tightly after use.

name: Chiikawa Mini Gargle Cup & Stand (Chiikawa)
description:
By tilting the cup on the stand after use, the water can be drained, and since the drinking mouth does not touch the sink, it can be used hygienically. It is a mini size cup with a capacity of 90ml. It is also convenient for small uses such as mouthwash.

・Do not wash with hard materials such as scouring pads.
・Do not sterilize by boiling.
・Do not wash in a dishwasher.

Size (approx.):
  Cup: H58×W58×D58mm
  Stand: H77×W60×D60mm
  Package: H115×W70×D70mm

Raw material resin: AS
Heat resistance temperature: 80 degrees

Capacity: 90ml

Material:   Cup: AS
  Stand: ABS, PVC, TPR
Manufacturing location: Bangladesh
